widget.name: Tasks
widget.description:
An App to record your tasks and time .
The time starts getting rercorded during insertion of the task by default . You can start the task anytime again by pressing the start button . This will work when the task is not checked .
In the completed field , it shows all completed tasks with the time of completion .
In the incomplete field , it shows incomplete tasks but you cannot interact with this page( next version might show task entry date ) .
etc.
